commands.message: List files and directories in the specified directory.
Print the current working directory.
change the current working directory to the specific directory.
Create an empty file or update the timestamp of an existing file.
Create a new directory.
Remove a file or directory.
Copy files or directories.
Move or rename files or directories.
Display the contents of a file.
Display the first lines of a file.
Display the last lines of a file.
View file content one screen at a time.
Search for text patterns in files.
Search for files by name.
List currently running processes.
Terminate a running process.
Display a dynamic view of system processes.
Show disk space usage.
Display the size of directories and subdirectories.
Display memory usage.
